item.name: Calpheon Ferry Prow
item.desc:
A Calpheon prow that can be attached to a ferry. It allows the boat to sail faster when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
Weight Limit +100LT
- Mounts Usable: Ferry
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).
